hadith.text: Narrated AbuSa'id al-Khudri: A man emigrated to the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) from the Yemen. He asked (him): Have you anyone (of your relatives) in the Yemen? He replied: My parents. He asked: Did they permit you? He replied: No. He said: Go back to them and ask for their permission. If they permit you, then fight (in the path of Allah), otherwise be devoted to them
